1.question: You need to hire a team of highly intelligent people to be able to scale your business.

2.question: It's okay to borrow money if it has the chance to increase your success in the future

3.question: I wait until a product is well tested before trying it out myself

4.question: The most successful entrepreneurs are those that have no constraints/barriers

5.question: People tend to be hestitant about the ideas I propose

6.question: It is okay to work on tasks even if the end goal is not clear

7.question: When starting your company, it is important to have junior members/interns who can do the smaller, monotonous tasks

8.question: My productivity is high when there are rewards/appreciation waiting for me

9.question: I work on tasks as and when I think of them

10.question: In the early days of your company, it is best to hire experts to do what you don't know how to do

11.question: The content of a presentation is more important than the look and feel.

13.question: In order to inspire someone, you need to have gone through similar experiences as they have

17.question: Some people just have better luck than others

21.question: It is difficult to maintain quality if you scale your business

22.question: A bird in the hand is better than two in the bush

23.question: It is better to make products that customers are already used to using

26.question: In a dynamic environment, goals keep changing
